TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseChannelSinkWithProperties extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties
Public MustInherit Class BaseChannelSinkWithProperties Inherits BaseChannelObjectWithProperties

summary.span: 提供希望向其属性公开字典接口的信道接收器的基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for channel sinks that want to expose a dictionary interface to their properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供允许访问流经该通道，以及传输机制用于将消息发送到的远程对象的流的基础消息的插件点。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages that are flowing through the channel as well as the stream that is used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器链中的信道接收器提供程序，链接在一起，并且所有通道消息要序列化和传输消息之前都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. 此类，可以链接要求并且在类级别继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 一个直接调用方或派生的类不包含基础结构权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CPP/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CS/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/VB/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.vb#2)]

permission.span: 用于操作的基础结构代码。

span.para: 继承自，则必须实现属性和属性。
When you inherit from , you must implement the property and the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器链中的信道接收器提供程序链接在一起，所有信道消息流过此接收器链的序列化和传输消息之前。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CPP/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CS/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/VB/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.vb#2)]
